attacks.name: Blow Through
attacks.effect: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Power Blast
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pokémon EX Rule
attacks.effect: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
